name: Mukondin
description:
Mukondin is a text adventure game about emulating what it's like to get lost in a mall where no one speaks the same language that you do.

Play as Bean, a child who has come to visit their mother's home country. Bean gets separated from their parents and has to try and make it back to them.

Use the mouse button to navigate the choices and interface. You can also use the numbered buttons to navigate the choices.

Use the right mouse button to skip past text paragraphs if you're a fast reader.

This game was made for STS 350 by Goes Beyond Games - Robert MacGillivray, Dylan Nixon, Atharv Vohra, Nate Spasiuk and Jaylene Marshal.
